actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 94-610.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to authorize the Federal Farm Credit Board to fix the compensation of the Governor and Deputy Governors of the Farm Credit Administration.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 94-610) Provides that the compensation of the Governor and Deputy Governors of the Farm Credit Administration shall be established by the Federal Farm Credit Board but at a rate not to exceed the maximum rate of basic pay in the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to authorize the Federal Farm Credit Board to fix the compensation of the Governor and Deputy Governors of the Farm Credit Administration.
